name: Les Orchidees

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Les Orchidees over the Easter weekend.
reviews.title: Lovely Accommodation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Any emails I sent requesting information on prices and booking the accommodation and also about the surrounding area were replied to promptly by Alain with all the answers I needed- and more. As we stayed 3 nights at the accommodation we were given a discount on the price.
reviews.title: Peace and Quiet

reviews.text: We were met by Alain and Patricia on arrival who were so friendly and welcoming and provided lots of information about the surrounding area and places to visit.
reviews.title: A great find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room and ensuite bathroom were spotlessly clean and well equipped and could not be faulted. The best nights sleep I have had in a long time!
reviews.title: Ideal location for touring the Somme

reviews.text: Well, what can I say about breakfast? In a very welcoming sunroom we were provided with fresh fruit salad every morning along with Patricia's gorgeous home made bread along with jam, yoghurts and endless tea/coffee. On 2 of the mornings Patricia had also made the most delicious fruit cake/flan! Along with the enjoyable company of Patricia, Alain and the other guests staying at Les Orchidees at breakfast, this got our day off to a good start.
reviews.title: perfect for my purpose

description: Welcome to the Orchids B&B ! Come and enjoy the serenity of the Somme Valley, only a frog's leap from Villers-Bretonneux and Amiens. With your B&B room, you will also have access to our indoor swimming-pool, fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities and fitness corner. Not forgetting our orchid collection.
